m_szDocTitle: How Much Does Nuclear Waste Processing Cost the U.K?
m_szDocSumamry: November 19th, 2012 by Nicholas Brown     According to the United Kingdom’s Department of Energy and Climate Change (DECC) 2012 and 2013 budget, of which the information was obtained from its 2012-2015 business plan , “nuclear legacy” issues cost £2.5 billion, roughly 42% of the Department of Energy and Climate Change’s total budget. I was shocked, too.
